title: The Tyranny of Friendship
description: Two boys become close friends at school. One is shy but gifted musically, the other more extrovert protects and promotes his friend.In adulthood when one is in a successful rock band and the other is planning a business venture they conceal a serious crime that will divide and define their lives, one to a fulfilling self-exile in California, the other to disillusionment, family break-up and a humdrum existence.Thirty years later a meeting for the one still in their hometown triggers disturbing memories but the women in their lives bring them back together to face the past.
author: John  Boman
